TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Imaging extends System.Object
public ref class Imaging abstract sealed

summary.span: Prend en charge de l’interopérabilité managé création d’objets image.

span.span: Provides managed to unmanaged interoperation support for creating image objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette classe fournit des mécanismes de création pour la bitmap principale d’imagerie de classe dans [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], .This class provides creation mechanisms for the primary bitmap imaging class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], . Cela inclut des méthodes qui créent un selon [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objets et des sections de mémoire.This includes methods that create a based on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gdi](~/includes/tlasharptla-gdi-md.md)] objects , and memory sections.
